mapper.sql: a.id_ AS "id", a.recruit_no AS "recruitNo", a.post AS "post", a.num AS "num", a.details AS "details", a.status AS "status", a.view_count AS "viewCount", a.created_time AS "createdTime", a.com_name AS "comName", cd.code_name AS "typeName", tsc.code_name AS "salaryName", CASE WHEN a.status = '1' THEN '有效' WHEN a.status = '0' THEN '无效' ELSE '错误' END AS 'statusName'
LEFT JOIN tb_service_code cd ON cd.group_id = 'recruitType' AND cd.code_value = a.type LEFT JOIN tb_service_code tsc ON tsc.group_id = 'recruitSalary' AND tsc.code_value = a.salary
